caption.title: Age-depth model for S1 with uncertainties.
caption.p: Upper: Age uncertainties for each corrected U-Th age as percentages. Note logarithmic scale. Lower: Age-depth model for stalagmite S1 (green line) with corresponding 95% confidence limits (red lines). Black circles indicate individual U-Th ages, error bars show 2Ïƒ uncertainties. #1 to #3 denotes growth periods separated by hiatuses.
